datasets.summary: Contains enterprise births, deaths and survivals
datasets.name: Business births and deaths

lede: Data on business births relates to businesses that register as VAT or PAYE businesses in a given time period. Data on business deaths relates to businesses that have ceased to trade in a given time period. Business survival rates are the percentage of businesses that are still registered a given number of years after they first registered.
name: Business births, deaths and survival rates
